title: Any setting equivalent to "resolution pyramid"?
body:
**Task** (what are you trying to do/register?)

I am training the VxmAffine for rigid registration. I found the level of resolution pyramids an important parameter when using the iterative approach ([SimpleElastix](https://simpleelastix.github.io/)) on my data. Perhaps `--blurs` is the way to do something similar in VoxelMorph?

**What have you tried**

- When training with the default `--blurs 1`, the convergence looks fine, but the test samples got very little transformations, which is similar to when using <3 resolution levels in the iterative approach.
- I tried `--blurs 5 4 3 2 1`, the model did not converge well and gave strange transformations on test samples. In comparison, the results are very successful when using 5-7 resolution levels in the iterative approach.

Perhaps I am not using it correctly?

**Details of experiments**

I am using NMI loss with `--bidir`. 

Thank in advance!
